resources.string: Body Shape Quiz
female
male
Would you like to receive advice tailored to your body type? The quiz below is for you:
Please type your name
Which gender do you identify yourself with:
Start Quiz
Are your shoulders narrower than your hips?
yes

no
Your body shape is triangle.
Your body shape is inverted triangle

Do you have defined waist?

Your body shape is rectangle

Find out more...
TOPS: Show-off your slender upper body, create a fuller illusion at the right places to balance out the wider hips
BOTTOMS: Focus on pants which make your lower half look smaller. Dark colors, straight lines are best.
SHOES: Wear heels to lengthen the figure
TOPS: Go for tops that lighten or slim down your upper half and minimize your broad shoulders, but without erasing your curves or the bust.
BOTTOMS: Aim to balace your upper half adding more curves.
SHOES: All of them!
Your first question...
Welcome
You are taking the quiz for men body shapes. Your first question...
inverted_triangle_female
TOPS: You want to create more curves, more feminine silouette by defining the waist
BOTTOMS: Aim to add curves in proportion to your upper body look
SHOES: All of them!
image_descr_rectangle_female
TOPS: Find tops which add volume/accentuate your shoulders and bust while defining your waistline
BOTTOMS: Avoid extra bulkiness
SHOES: All of them!
image_descr_oval_female
TOPS: Emphasize your feminine figure but try to avoid appearing heavy
BOTTOMS: All of them! But not all of them will go with all tops.
SHOES: Stilettos will make you look THE classic
image_descr_hourglass

TOPS: Wear horizontal stripes (from the chest down). Wear slim-fit shirts (size up!). Slim cotton polo shirt (with a spandex mix) will look good as well as regular (not plunging!) V-neck T-shirts (the collar shape has a narrowing influence on your chest).
BOTTOMS: Wear straight-leg trousers/jeans (slim fit). But stay away from skinny jeans. Choose patterned pants, camo shorts or checked trousers.
image_descr_inverted_triangle_male
image_descr_trapezoid_male

TOPS: Shirts with vertical stripes will make you appear taller. Checks and plaids add horizontal bulk. Choose which one you need based on your height. Wear a blazer or suit jacket tapering your waist, your stomach will look slimmer and your shoulders broader.
BOTTOMS: All patterns and colours are good, go for slim fit, skip buggy trousers.
Your body shape is trapezoid. Please see below for best style practices.
Your body shape is rectangle
TOPS: Wear horizontal stripes. Jackets with structured shoulders will look good on you, as well as layered looks: shirt + fine-gauge crew neck jumper
BOTTOMS: All looks good!
We need to ask you a few more questions to determine your body shape.
Are your hips wider than the shoulders?
Are your shoulders the widest part of your body?
Do you have a very slim waist (in proportion to your upper body)?
Your body shape is oval
TOPS: Wear solid colors, no patterns. Dark, single-breasted, very slightly tapered jackets are best.
BOTTOMS: The waist should be comfortable, you can use braces.
One last question.
Are your shoulders, waist and hips same width?
Your body shape is triangle
TOPS: Wear vertical stripes and bright colors above the waistline on shirts or sweaters. Jackets with structured shoulders and single-brested suits will look good on you.
BOTTOMS: Wear straight leg / regular fits in solid colours.
